mapper.select: select * from room where hotelnum = #{selectedHotel } and (num NOT in (select room_num from book where room_num IN (SELECT num FROM room WHERE hotelnum = #{selectedHotel}) and (checkin <= #{checkin } and checkout >= #{checkout }) or (checkin <= #{checkout } and checkout >= #{checkin})))

select h.num, h.name, h.addr, h.phone, h.photo, r.roomtype, r.roommemo, r.roomdetail, r.roomphoto, date_format(b.checkin, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") checkin, date_format(b.checkout, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") checkout, json_unquote(json_extract(b.peopleinfo, '$.adult')) adult, json_unquote(json_extract(b.peopleinfo, '$.kids')) kids, b.memo, b.total_price,m.user_name from hotel h inner join room r on h.num = r.hotelnum inner join book b on b.room_num = r.num inner join member m on b.user_num = m.num where b.num = #{num} and m.pw = sha2(#{pw}, 256);
